sdata.j: ↑局地↑↓きょくち↓↑的↑↓てき↓な|↑大雨|↑↓おおあめ↓だったらしいけど、↑行↑↓い↓かなくて↑正解↑↓せいかい↓だったよ。
sdata.e: I'm glad we didn't go there because there were some localized heavy rain showers.

sdata.e: I had hardly left home when it began to rain heavily.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑中|↑↓ちゅう↓↑大雨|↑↓おおあめ↓だったので、その↑間↑↓かん↓↑家↑↓か↓に↑閉↑↓と↓じこもっていた。
sdata.e: It rained heavily all day, during which time I stayed indoors.

sdata.e: The heavy rain brought floods in the valley.

sdata.e: The game was canceled because of the heavy rain.
